fullplot: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclair's associates are placing their bets.
plot: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.
title: Rat Race

tomatoes.consensus: Rat Race moves from one sight gag to another, but only a handful of them are genuinely funny.
